attributes.action: Invite David Cameron to join Labour and take control of Britain, replacing Gordon Brown.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no democracy in Britain when Gordon Brown can control the country and refuse a re-election without being elected nor voted for by the British public.

David Cameron should replace Gordon Brown and become the new leader of a failing dictatorial empire filled with mindless grey automatons whom care only for their football club and not their inherited obligations...
